audioJson.name: Sabamobil
audioJson.fact1: This format was introduced a year after the Compact Cassette and 8-track, and wasn't able to compete in the market
audioJson.fact2: One model, the TK-R12, had a built-in radio and could be portable, using 5 D-size batteries
audioJson.fact3: The cartridge could be opened by removing the two holding clamps
